title: Distributed Construction of Fault Resilient High Capacity Wireless Networks with Bounded Node Degree.
abstract: Embodiments described include methods of determining neighboring nodes with which to link a subject node in a wireless communication network. Depending on the network preferences, the links between neighbor nodes and the subject node may include high capacity links or fault resilient high capacity links. The number of neighboring nodes may be as high as ten in a fault resilient high capacity network and five or less for a high capacity network.
departments: University of Science and Technology of China
